article_title: Four-day ceasefire between Israel and Hamas due to begin now.
sentence: Hamas  -  which  Israel,  the  US  and  other  Western  powers  class  as  a  terrorist  organisation  -  has  said  the  deal  will  give  Palestinians  time  to  recover  after  an  intense  Israeli  air  and  ground  assault  which  its  government  in  Gaza  says  has  killed  more  than  14,500  people.
